common_helper_container: The container name must be between 3 and 63 characters long, start and end with a lowercase letter or number (a to z, 0 to 9), and it can include the punctuation marks "." and "-".
common_helper_endpoint: The endpoint must be in URL format.
common_helper_access_key: An access key must contain 32 alphanumeric characters.
common_helper_secret_key: A secret key must contain 32 alphanumeric characters.
title: SAP Pre-Installation Wizard - Step {{step}}/{{total}}
description: This wizard will guide you through the steps you need to follow to pre-install a SAP system.
wizard_subtitle: You can transfer a configuration file from a previous SAP pre-installation in order to pre-populate the wizard with the same values:
wizard_content: If you aren’t transferring a file, you’ll need to fill in all the values in the wizard.
wizard_error_file: The file provided is not valid. If you launch the installation anyway, you’ll need to enter all of the values in the wizard.
service_title: Select your VMware on OVHcloud service
service_subtitle: Select your VMware on OVHcloud service, datacentre and the cluster on which you want to deploy your SAP system.
service_input_error_service_invalid: You need to select an active service to continue.
service_input_error_no_cluster_available: You need to select a datacentre containing hosts to continue.
deployment_subtitle: Select the type of installation that aligns best with your needs.
system_title: Specify the details of your future SAP system
system_subtitle: Enter the details of your future SAP system that aligns best with your needs.
system_sid_validation_message: An SID must contain 3 uppercase alphanumeric characters and start with a letter.
system_password_sap_validation_message: The password must contain between 10 and 30 characters, including a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character except \ (backslash), ' (single quote), " (double quote), ` (backtick), $ (dollar sign), and it must not contain successive special characters {% or %}
system_password_sap_hana_validation_mess: The password must contain between 10 and 30 characters, including a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character from _ (underscore), # (hash), @ (at symbol), $ (dollar sign), ! (exclamation mark), and it must not start with a number or underscore (_)
system_password_sap_master_helper: This will be used for all SAP users requested by the installer (DDIC, sapadm, etc.)
system_cta: Enter the location of the SAP sources
source_subtitle: Enter the information for your OVHcloud Object Storage container, where your SAP installation sources are located.
source_error_check: An error has occurred from the container information provided: {{error}}
os_config_subtitle: Enter the information and optional configurations of the OS that aligns best with your needs.
os_config_helper_domain: Please enter a valid domain name
os_config_helper_suse: The key must be in alphanumeric format and must contain between 16 and 32 characters
os_config_toggle_update: Perform an OS package update before installation
os_config_toggle_firewall_service: Enable the firewall for central services
os_config_tooltip_firewall_service: Allows all communication on the SCS from other servers in this SAP system
os_config_toggle_firewall_server: Enable the firewall for application servers
os_config_tooltip_firewall_server: Allows all communication on the application servers from other servers in this SAP system
os_config_toggle_firewall_database: Enable the firewall for the SAP HANA database
os_config_tooltip_firewall_database: Allows all communication to the SAP HANA database from other servers in this SAP system
enablement_subtitle: You can enable and configure the optional SAP features that align best with your needs.
enablement_input_has_backup: OVHcloud Backint agent for SAP HANA databases
enablement_input_id_container_tooltip: This container will be used to store your DATA and LOG backups.
enablement_input_endpoint_helper: The endpoint must be in URL format.
enablement_input_has_logs_ldp_ovh: SAP logs via the OVHcloud Logs Data Platform
enablement_input_has_logs_ldp_ovh_helper: Performs OS configuration on all servers in the SID to export the SAP logs (including "Security Audit Log") to the Logstash specified below (this requires additional manual post-configuration).
enablement_input_logstash_entrypoint_hel: The entrypoint must be in URL format and end with ".logs.ovh.com".
enablement_input_logstash_certificat_err: The certificate provided is not in the correct format.
server_config_subtitle: Enter the number of virtual machines, their sizes and the configurations that align best with your needs.
server_config_error_vmware_ports: Please select a VMware port group.
server_config_helper_subnet_mask: The subnet mask must be in IPv4 format
server_config_helper_gateway_ip: The default gateway must be in IPv4 format
server_config_error_thick_storage: Please select a Thick storage policy.
server_config_tooltip_password_encryptio: Indicates whether Root passwords are provided in clear or hashed form
server_config_helper_vm_name: The name must be between 3 and 64 characters long, start and end with an alphanumeric character, and it can include the characters '-' and '_'.
server_config_helper_vcpu_hana_vm: The vCPU quantity must be a whole number between 8 and 192.
server_config_helper_vcpu_applications_v: The vCPU quantity must be a whole number between 1 and 192.
server_config_helper_ram_hana_vm: The amount of RAM must be a whole number between 64 and 4096.
server_config_helper_ram_applications_vm: The amount of RAM must be a whole number between 1 and 4096.
server_config_helper_root_password: The password must contain between 8 and 128 characters, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters and numbers. Special characters are allowed, except $, \, ", ', and `.
server_config_helper_ipv4_address: The IP address must be in IPv4 format.
server_config_helper_instance_number: The instance number must be between 00 and 97.
server_config_error_DUPLICATED_NAME: Each application server must have a unique name.
server_config_error_DUPLICATED_IP: Each application server must have a unique IP address.
summary_subtitle: Please review the information entered before starting the installation. You can also download the configuration file for your <DownloadLink label="ici">{{label}}</DownloadLink> installation. You can use it again later to start a new installation.
installation_error_server_message: An error has occurred submitting information. Error message: "{{error}}"
